this_title: Secrets of the Surface: The Mathematical Vision of Maryam Mirzakhani
trans_title: 曲面的秘密：玛丽安·米尔札哈尼的数学世界
introduction: Filmed in Canada, Iran, and the United States, Secrets of the Surface: The Mathematical Vision of Maryam Mirzakhani examines the life and mathematical work of Maryam Mirzakhani, an Iranian immigrant to the United States who became a superstar in her field. In 2014, she was both the first woman and the first Iranian to be honored by mathematics' highest prize, the Fields Medal. ...
chinese_title: 曲面的秘密：玛丽安·米尔札哈尼的数学世界
foreign_title: Secrets of the Surface: The Mathematical Vision of Maryam Mirzakhani
